content.2: Son of man, set thy face toward the mountains of Israel, and prophesy against them,
content.3: And say, Ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord
content.4: And your altars shall be desolate, and your images shall be broken: and I will cast down your slain
content.5: And I will lay the dead carcases of the children of Israel before their idols; and I will scatter your bones round about your altars.
content.6: In all your dwellingplaces the cities shall be laid waste, and the high places shall be desolate; that your altars may be laid waste and made desolate, and your idols may be broken and cease, and your images may be cut down, and your works may be abolished.
